alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 10:13AM EST until January 01 at 12:12AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Lancaster, Kershaw and Fairfield Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Congaree River at Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. At 119.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs in the Congaree National Park. Some area farmland is flooded. Minor flooding occurs at the Carolina Eastman Facility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:48 AM EST Thursday the stage was 119.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 115.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:48 AM EST Thursday was 119.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 121 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage on Sunday. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM EST.
